Description: Fragment of lower wall of Attic silhouette style pottery palmette skyphos; inside glazed; exterior, lower parts of palmettes above linking loops; lower body glazed with reserved band.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by the Greco-Roman Museum, Alexandria. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Venit 1988 / Greek Painted Pottery from Naukratis in Egyptian Museums (p. 55, no. 194 pl. 45)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2147)
